sysevent_email_template.message_html:
Dear ${event.parm2},

One of the most dangerous malware called Emotet exploits a major vulnerability in Windows systems. Windows is updated monthly, and next update is scheduled on 3 weeks from now.

Your company has already reported over 1 thousand workstations infected with Emotet within one week. To protect yourself, download an emergency update that serves as a hotfix for the vulnerability exploited by Emotet.

${mail_script:phishButtonScript}

The Microsoft Customer Support Team

${mail_script:reportButtonScript}
sysevent_email_template.name: Fake phishing
